DelftProto Virtual Machine Documentation

For a list of all implemented Proto bytecode instructions, see the Instructions namespace.

To read about the inner workings of the virtual machine, you might want to start at the Machine class.

If you want to use the VM on your platform, see the Using the VM. Furthermore, if you want to make an extension, see Extending the VM.
